name: Lister
relicBonuses: After the bearer {ACTION_attacks} or is {ACTION_attacked}, it afflicts the enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}.
At the start of the bearer's turn, this relic afflicts a random enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}.
After an enemy takes damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}, the bearer recovers {STAT_health} equal to 30% of the damage dealt.
After an enemy takes damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}, this relic has a 25% chance to {ACTION_attack} it.
After this relic or its bearer {ACTION_attacks} an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}, it has a 25% chance to take damage from this debuff immediately.
At the start of each enemy's turn, this relic has a 20% chance to {ACTION_cast} [icons,1976]Mangle on it.
After an enemy takes damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}, the bearer has a 25% chance to {ACTION_attack} it.
When an enemy takes damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}, it has a 50% chance to continue taking damage from this debuff. This effect can occur repeatedly.
After the bearer {ACTION_attacks} a target with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1968]Lacerate on the target.
title: God of Anger
